entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Lawrence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Lawrence 03:30 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -16.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -21.1°C
Wind: NNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22 except minus 17 along the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22 except minus 17 along the coast. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18 except minus 14 along the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18 except minus 14 along the coast. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
